fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

Class AbstractConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, ComponentServiceI, RequiredI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDataConnector, AbstractTwoWayConnector, DynamicComponentCreationConnector, DynamicConnectionRequestConnector, ExampleConnector, IntegerFilteringConnector, IntegerProcessingConnector, IntercessionConnector, IntrospectionConnector, MapReadingConnector, MapWritingConnector, MyServiceConnector, PingPongConnector, PushControlConnector, ReflectionConnector, URIConsumerLaunchConnector, URIServiceConnector, ValueProvidingConnector

    public abstract class AbstractConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectorI
    The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              this.connected() implies
                     this.offering != null and this.requiring != null
 invariant              this.connected() implies
                    this.requiringPortURI != null and
                                         this.offeringPortURI != null

    Created on : 2011-11-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
